C

Card - Class in <Unnamed>
This class creates the cards of the memory game.
Card() - Constructor for class Card
Creates a card and set it as closed and unpaired.
CARD_NO_LETTERS - Static variable in class UI
 
checkAllCardConditions(int) - Method in class Logic
Asks through the class Ui the player the coordinates of his/her choice card and checks all the possible conditions in order given coordinates to be valid.
checkCharStoreInt(int) - Static method in class UI
Checks if coordinates of a card are not chars.
choiceIsOpen() - Static method in class UI
Prints the appropriate message if the chosen card is already opened.
choiceIsPaired() - Static method in class UI
Prints the appropriate message if the chosen card is already paired.
choiceOutOfBounds(Table) - Static method in class UI
Prints the appropriate messages if the given coordinates are out of bounds.
chosenMode(int) - Static method in class UI
Prints proper message for given game mode.
clearScreen() - Static method in class UI
Clears screen.
closeCard(int, int) - Method in class Table
Hides the card
clsIntroShowCards(Table) - Static method in class UI
Clears screen, prints intro and shows the cards.
congrats(int) - Static method in class UI
Prints a congrats message when the player finishes the game
consoleArgsIntro(int) - Static method in class UI
Handles console's argument input.
